original: svarastu veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛnna kāvya iti tasya viṣayo nodāhṛtaḥ /

tat na tathā hi

original: kiñca yadi yatra kvacidanekārthaśabdānāṃ prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādaniyantritayorapyarthayoranurūpasvaravaśenaikatra niyamanaṃ vācyaṃ,

original: nakṣatreśakṛ tekṣaṇo girigurau gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan gāmākramya vibhūtibhūṣitatanū rājatyumāvallabhaḥ” //

analyzed: tarhi katham kāvyataḥ sarveṣām īdṛśī rasa abhivyaktiḥ na jāyate iti atas āha

original: na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām // VisSd_3.8 //
analyzed: na jāyate tad āsvādaḥ vinā rati ādi vāsanām

original: tatra yadyādyā na syāttadā śrotriyajaranmīmāṃsakādīnāmapi sa syāt /

original: yadi dvitīyā na syāttadā yadragiṇā mapi keṣāñcidrasodvodho na dṛśyate tanna syāt /
analyzed: yadi dvitīyā na syāt tadā yat ragiṇām api keṣāñcid rasa udvodhaḥ na dṛśyate tat na syāt
uktam ca dharmmadattena
sa vāsanānām sabhyānām rasasya āsvādanam bhavet
nirvāsanāḥ tu raṅga antar kāṣṭha kuḍya aśma sannibhāḥ
iti
nanu katham rāma ādi rati ādi udvodha kāraṇaiḥ sītā ādibhiḥ sāmājika rati ādi udvodhaḥ eti ucyate
vyāpāraḥ sti vibhāva ādeḥ nāmnā sādhāraṇīkṛtiḥ
tad prabhāveṇa yasya āsan pāthodhi plavana ādayaḥ
pramātā tad abhedena sva ātmānam pratipadyate
nanu katham manuṣya mātrasya samudra laṅghana ādau utsāha udvodhaḥ iti ucyate
utsāha ādi samudvodhaḥ sādhāraṇya abhimānataḥ
nṛṇām api samudra ādi laṅghana ādau na duṣyati
rati ādayaḥ pi sādhāraṇyena eva pratīyāntaḥ iti āha
sādhāraṇyena rati ādiḥ api tadvat pratīyate
rati ādeḥ api sva ātma gata tvena pratītau sabhyānām brīḍā ātaṅka ādiḥ bhavet
para gata tvena tvarasya tā āpātaḥ
vibhāva ādayaḥ pi prathamatas sādhāraṇyena pratīyante iti āha

original: parasya na parasyeti mameti na mameti ca /
analyzed: parasya na parasya iti mama iti na mama iti ca

original: tadāsvāde vibhāvādeḥ paricchedo na vidyate // VisSd_3.12 //
analyzed: tad āsvāde vibhāva ādeḥ paricchedaḥ na vidyate
nanu tathā api katham evam alaukika tvam eteṣām vibhāva ādīnām iti ucyate

original: alaukikatvameteṣāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ na tu dūṣaṇam // VisSd_3.13 //

original: vibhāvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāraṇakāryyasahakāritve kathaṃ trayāṇāmapi rasodbodhe kāraṇatvamityucyate --
analyzed: vibhāva ādīnām yathāsaṅkhyam kāraṇa kāryya sahakāri tve katham trayāṇām api rasa udbodhe kāraṇa tvam iti ucyate

original: nanu tarhi kathaṃ rasāsvāde teṣāmekaḥ pratibhāsa ityucyate--

original: tataḥ sambalitaḥ sarvo vibhāvādiḥ sacetasām // VisSd_3.15 //

original: yathā khaṇḍamaricādīnāṃ sammelanādapūrvva iva kaścidāsvādaḥ prapāṇakarase sañjāyate vibhāvādisammelanādihāpi tathetyarthaḥ /

original: nanu yadi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhirmmilitaireva rasastat kathaṃ teṣāmekasya dvayorvā sadbhāve 'pi sa syādityucyate--

tadā doṣaḥ na vidyate
anya samākṣepaḥ ca prakaraṇa ādi vaśāt

original: “dīrghākṣaṃ śaradindukāntivadanaṃ bāhū natāvaṃsayoḥ saṅkṣiptaṃ nibiḍonnatastanamuraḥ pārśve pramṛṣṭe iva /

original: madhyaḥ pāṇimito nitambi jaghanaṃ pādāvudagrāṅgulī dhando narttayituryathaiva manasaḥ sṛṣṭaṃ tathāsyā vapuḥ” //

atra mālavikām abhilaṣataḥ gnimitrasya mālavikā rūpa vibhāva mātra varṇane sañcāriṇām autsukya ādīnām anubhāvānām ca nayana visphāra ādīnām aucityāt eva ākṣepaḥ

anukāryyasya rati ādeḥ udbodhaḥ na rasaḥ bhavet

original: sītādidarśanādijo rāmādiratyādyudbodho hi parimito laukiko nāṭyakāvyadarśanādeḥ sāntarāyaśca,
analyzed: sītā ādi darśana ādi jaḥ rāma ādi rati ādi udbodhaḥ hi parimitaḥ laukikaḥ nāṭya kāvya darśana ādeḥ sa antarāyaḥ ca
tasmāt katham rasa rūpa tām iyāt
ka rasasya etad dharma tritaya vilakṣaṇa dharmmaka tvāt

darśayan narttakaḥ nā eva rasasya āsvādakaḥ bhavet

original: yadi punarnaṭo 'pi kāvyārthabhāvanayā rāmādisvarūpatāmātmano darśayet tadā so 'pi sabhyamadhya eva gaṇyate /

original: yo hi jñāpyo ghaṭādiḥ sannapi kadācidajñāto bhavati,

original: yadi rasaḥ kāryaḥ syāttadā vibhāvādijñānakāraṇaka eva syāt /

tatas ca rasa pratīti kāle vibhāva ādayaḥ na pratīyeran
kāraṇa jñāna takāryya jñānayoḥ yugapad adarśanāt
nahi candana sparśa jñānam tad janya sukha jñānañca ekadā sambhavati
rasasya ca vibhāva ādi samūha ālambana ātmaka tayā eva pratīteḥ na vibhāva ādi jñāna kāraṇa tvam iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: asaṃvedanakāle hi na bhāvo 'ṣyasya vidyate (ka) // VisSd_3.21 //
analyzed: a saṃvedana kāle hi na vidyate ka
na khalu nityasya vastunaḥ saṃvedana kāle sambhavaḥ
na api bhavipyan sākṣāt ānanda maya sva prakāśa rūpa tvāt
kārya kṣāpya vilakṣaṇa bhāvāt no varttamānaḥ pi
vibhāva ādi parāmarśa viṣaya tvāt sa cetasām
parānanda maya tvena saṃvedya tvāt api sphuṭam
na nirvikalpakam jñānam tasya grāhakam iṣyate
tathā abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya tva virahāt na ca
sa vikalpaka jñāna saṃvedyānām hi vacana prayoga yogya tā
na tu rasasya tathā
sākṣātkāra tayā na ca
parokṣaḥ tad prakāśaḥ na aparokṣaḥ śabda saṃbhavāt
tat kathaya kīdṛś asya tattvam aśruta adṛṣṭa pūrva nirupaṇa prakārasya iti āha

analyzed: tat etat kva ācakṣe ghṛta madhu maya tvad vahu vacaḥ viṣeṇa āghūrṇantī kim api na sakhī me gaṇayati
eṣām ca traividhyāt uttama madhya adhama tvena
uktāḥ nāyaka bhedāḥ catvāriṃśat tathā aṣṭau ca
eṣām ukta ṣoḍaśa bhedānām
atha prasaṅgāt eteṣām sahāyān āha
dūra anuvartini syāt tasya prāsaṅgika iti vṛtte tu
kiñcid tad guṇa hīnaḥ sahāyaḥ eva asya pīṭhamardda ākhyaḥ

original: tasya nāyakasya bahuvyāpini prasaṅgasaṃgate itivṛtte 'nantaroktairnāyakasāmānyaguṇaiḥ kiñcidūnaḥ pīṭhamarddanāmāsahāyo bhavati /
analyzed: tasya nāyakasya bahu vyāpini prasaṅga saṃgate iti vṛtte nantara uktaiḥ nāyaka sāmānya guṇaiḥ kiñcid ūnaḥ pīṭhamardda nāmā sahāyaḥ bhavati

atha śṛṅgārasahāyāḥ

original: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupitavadhūmānabhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40 //

original: veśopacārakuśalo vāggmī madhuro 'tha bahumato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //

sva karma hāsya ādi
artha cintane sahāyam āha

yat tu atra sahāya kathana prastāve

original: “mantrī svaṃ cobhayaṃ vāpi sakhā tasyārthacintane” iti kenācillakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam,
analyzed: mantrī svam ca ubhayam vā api sakhā tasya artha cintane iti kena acid lakṣaṇam kṛtam
tat api rājñaḥ ūrtha cintana upāya lakṣaṇa prakaraṇaḥ lakṣayitavyam
na tu sahāya kathana prakaraṇaḥ

original: “nāyakasyārthacintane mantrī sahāyaḥ” ityukte 'pi nāyakasyārthata eva siddhatvāt /

original: tvaṃ tu vaidagdhīmadhuraprabandharasikatayā mama vallabho 'sītyādivyaṅgyārthavaśādasyāḥ paranāyakaviṣayā ratiḥ pratīyate /

vidūre keyūre kuru

yathā
kim ruddhaḥ priyayā kayāci
dathavā sakhyā mama udvejitaḥ
kim vā kāraṇa gauravam kim api
yat na adya āgataḥ vallabhaḥ

original: ityālocya mṛgīdṛśā karatale vinyasya vaktrāmbujaṃ dīrghaṃ niḥ śvasitaṃ,

ciram ca ruditam
kṣiptāḥ ca puṣpa stra jaḥ
iti sa aṣṭāviṃśatiśatam uttama madhya adhama svarūpeṇa
catur adhika aśīti yutam śata trayam nāyikā bhedāḥ
iha ca para striyau kanyakā nyoḍhe saṃketāt pūrvam viraha utkaṇṭhite
paścāt vidūṣa ka ādinā saha abhisarantayau abhisārike
kutas saṃketa sthānam aprāpte nāyake vipralabdhe
iti tri avasthā eva anayoḥ asva adhīn na priyayoḥ avasthā antara ayogāt
iti kaścid
kvacid anyonya sāṅkaryam āsam lakṣyeṣu dṛśyate
yathā

original: “na khalu vayamamuṣya dānayogyāḥ pibati ca pāti ca yāsakau rahastvām /

original: viṭa / viṭapamamuṃ dadasva tasyai bhavati yataḥ sadṛśościrāya yogaḥ /

nanu jana viditaiḥ bhavat vyalīkaiḥ cira paripūritam eva karṇa yugmam

alaṅkārāḥ tatra bhāva hāva helāḥ trayaḥ ṅga jāḥ

yathā

nālikā ghaṭikā dvayam ucyate

tatra
dharma artha kāmaiḥ trividhaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ
kapaṭaḥ punar
svābhāvikaḥ kṛtrimaḥ ca daiva jaḥ vidravaḥ punar
acetanaiḥ cetanaiḥ ca cetana acetanaiḥ kṛtaḥ
tatra śāstra avirodhena kṛtaḥ dharma śṛṅgāraḥ

anyayoḥ tu na niyamaḥ iti āhuḥ

māyā indrajāla saṃgrāma krodha udbhrānta ādi ceṣṭitaiḥ

aṅgī raudra rasaḥ tatra sarve ṅgāni rasāḥ punar

bhūta preta piśāca ādyāḥ ṣoḍaśā atyantam uddhatāḥ

dīptāḥ syuḥ ṣaṭ rasāḥ

atha ihāmṛgaḥ
īhāmṛgaḥ miśra vṛttaḥ catur aṅkaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

varṇanā atra śmaśāna ādeḥ henaḥ syāt upanāyakaḥ
sapti viṃśatiḥ aṅgāni bhavanti etasya tāni tu
āśaṃsā tarka saṃdeha tāpa udvega prasaktayaḥ
vilāsa ālasya bāṣpāṇi praharṣa āśvāsa mūḍha tāḥ
sādhana anugama ucchavāsa vismaya prāptayaḥ tathā
lābha vismṛti saṃphoṭāḥ vaiśāradyam prabodhanam

atha vilāsikā

original: svalpavṛttā sunepathyā vikhyātā sā vilāsikā // VisSd_6.302 //

atha durmallikā

ṣaṇṇālikaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu pīṭhamarda vilāsavān
caturthaḥ daśa nāliḥ syāt aṅkaḥ krīḍita nāgaraḥ

atha prakaraṇikā

atha hallīśaḥ

original: hallīśa eka evāṅkaḥ saptāṣṭau daśa vā striyaḥ /

atha bhāṇikā

original: upanyāso 'tha vinyāso vibodhaḥ sādhvasaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.309 //

original: bhrāntināśo vibodhaḥ syānmithyākhyānaṃ tu sādhvasam // VisSd_6.311 //

original: ūrdhvanyastāṅighradaṇḍabhramibhararabhasodyannabhasvatpravega- bhrāntabrahmaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ pravitaratu śivaṃ śāmbhavaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ vaḥ” //

original: “tiṣṭhetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
analyzed: tiṣṭhet kopa vaśāt prabhāva pihitā dīrgham na sā kupyati svargāya utpatitā bhavet mayi punarbhāva ārdram asyāḥ manaḥ

original: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovartinīṃ sā cātyantamagocaraṃ nayanayorjāteti ko 'yaṃ vidhaiḥ” //
analyzed: tām hartum vibudha dviṣaḥ na ca me śaktāḥ purovartinīm sā ca atyantam agocaram nayanayoḥ jātā iti kaḥ yam vidhaiḥ

original: atra prabhāvapihitetiṃ bhavediti cetyanantaraṃ “naitadyataḥ” iti padāni nyūnāni /

original: “dīrghaṃ na se” tyādivākyajanyayā ca pratipattyā tiṣṭhedityādivākyapratipatterbodhaḥ sphuṭamevāvabhāsata iti na doṣaḥ /

guṇaḥ kvāṣi adhikam padam
yathā
ācariti durjanaḥ yat sahasā manasaḥ pi agocarān arthān

original: tanna na jāne jāne spṛśati manaḥ kiṃ tu naiva niṣṭhuratām” //
analyzed: tat na na jāne jāne spṛśati manaḥ kim tu nā eva niṣṭhura tām

dvitīye jāne iti anena na aham eva jāne iti anya yoga vyavacchedāt vicchitti viśeṣaḥ

original: samāptapunarā ttatvaṃ na doṣo na guṇaḥ kvacit /

original: “diṅmātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā sāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñjitāḥ paśyata /

patat prakarṣatā tathā

original: yatra ca vibhāvānubhāvakṛtapuṣṭirāhityamevānuguṇaṃ tatra vyabhicāriṇaḥ svaśabdenoktau na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: yatra ca vibhāva anubhāva kṛta puṣṭi rāhityam eva anuguṇam tatra vyabhicāriṇaḥ sva śabdena uktau na doṣaḥ
yathā

original: “autsukyena kṛtasvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā taistairbandhuvadhūjanasya vacanairnotābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: autsukyena kṛta svarā saha bhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā taiḥ taiḥ bandhu vadhū janasya vacanaiḥ na uta ābhimukhyam punar

original: dṛṣṭvāgre varamāttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave sahgame saṃhohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ” //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā agre varam ātta sādhvasa rasā gaurī nave sahgame hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāḥ tu vaḥ

original: atrotsukyasya tvarārūpānubhāvamukhena pratipādane saṅgame na bhktaṭiti pratītiḥ,
analyzed: atra utsukyasya tvarā rūpa anubhāva mukhena pratipādane saṅgame na pratītiḥ
tvarāyāḥ bhaya ādinā api sambhavāt
hriyaḥ nubhāvasya ca vyāvartamānasya kopa ādinā sambhavāt
sādhvasa hāsayoḥ tu vibhāva ādi paripoṣasya prakṛta rasa pratikūla prāya tvāt iti eṣām sva śabda abhidhānam eva nyāyyam
sañcāri ādeḥ viruddhasya bādhya tvena vacaḥ guṇaḥ

original: yathā--“kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulam-” ityādi /
analyzed: yathā kva akāryam śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulam ityādi
atra praśama aṅgānām vitarkam ati śaṅkā dhṛtīnām abhilāṣa aṅga autsukya smṛti dainya cintābhiḥ tiraskāraḥ paryante cintā pradhānam āsvāda prakarṣam āvirbhāvayati

original: virādhino 'pi smaraṇo sāmyena vacane 'pi vā // VisSd_7.30 //
analyzed: virādhinaḥ pi smaraṇaḥ sāmyena vacane pi vā
bhavet virodhaḥ na anyonyam aṅgini aṅga tvam āptayoḥ
krameṇa yathā ayam sa rasanā utkarṣaḥ ityādi

original: atrālambanavicchede raterarasātmatayā smaryamāṇānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ śokoddīpakatayā kuṇānukūlatā /
analyzed: atra ālambana vicchede rateḥ arasa ātma tayā smaryamāṇānām tad aṅgānām śoka uddīpaka tayā kuṇa anukūla tā
sa rāgayā struta ghana gharma toyayā kara āhati dhvanita pṛthu uru pīṭhayā
muhur muhur daśana vilaṅghita uṣṭhayā ruṣā nṛpāḥ priyatamayā iva bhejire
atra sambhoga śṛṅgāraḥ varṇanīya vīra vyabhicāriṇaḥ krodhasya anubhāva sāmyena vivakṣitaḥ

original: “ekaṃ dhyānimīlanānmukulitaprāyaṃ dvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārvatyā vadanāmbujastanabhare sambhogabhāvālasam /
analyzed: ekam dhyā nimīlanāt mukulita prāyam dvitīyam punar pārvatyāḥ vadana ambuja stana bhare sambhoga bhāva alasam
andat dūra vikṛṣṭa cāpa kamana krodha anala uddīpitam śambho bhinna rasam samādhi samaye netra trayam pātu vaḥ
atra śānta śṛṅgāra raudra rasa paripuṣṭā bhagavat viṣayā ratiḥ
yathā vā

original: “kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa /
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ hasta avalagnaḥ prasabham abhihataḥ gṛhṇan keśeṣu apāstaḥ caraṇa nipatitaḥ na īkṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa

original: āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhaiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ” //
analyzed: āliṅgan yaḥ vadhūtaḥ tripura yuvati bhaiḥ sa aśru netra utpalābhiḥ kāmī iva ārdra aparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritam śāmbhavaḥ vaḥ śara agniḥ
atra kavi gatā bhagavat viṣayā ratiḥ pradhānam

original: tasyāḥ paripoṣakatayā bhagavatastripuradhvaṃsaṃ pratyutsāhasyāparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmaprāptatayā bhāvamātrasya karuṇo 'ṅgam /
analyzed: tasyāḥ paripoṣaka tayā bhagavataḥ tripura dhvaṃsam pratyutsāhasya a paripuṣṭa tayā rasa padavīm aprāpta tayā bhāva mātrasya karuṇaḥ ṅgam
tasya ca kāmī iva iti sāmya balāt āyātaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ
evam ca aviśrānti dhāma tayā karuṇasya api aṅga tā eva iti dvayoḥ api karuṇa śṛṅgārayoḥ bhagavat utsāha paripuṣṭa tad viṣaya rati bhāva āsvāda prakaṣraka tayā yaugapadya sambhāvāt aṅga tvena
na virodhaḥ

original: nanu samūhālambanātmakapūrṇaghanānandarūpasya rasasya tādṛśenetararasena kathaṃ virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ ?
analyzed: nanu samūha ālambana ātmaka pūrṇaghana ānanda rūpasya rasasya tādṛśena itara rasena katham virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ
eka vākye niveśa prādurbhāvaiḥ yaugapadya viraheṇa paraspara upamardaka tva anupapatteḥ
na api aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ
dvayoḥ api pūrṇa tayā svātantryeṇa viśrānteḥ
satyam uktam

original: ata evātra pradhānetareṣu raseṣu svātantryaviśrāmarāhityātpūrṇarasabhāvamātrācca vilakṣaṇatayā saṃcārirasanāmnā vyapadeśaḥ prācyānām /
analyzed: atas eva atra pradhāna itareṣu raseṣu svātantrya viśrāma rāhityāt pūrṇa rasa bhāva mātrāt ca vilakṣaṇa tayā saṃcārirasa nāmnā vyapadeśaḥ prācyānām
asmad pitāmaha anuja kavi paṇḍita mukhya śrī caṇḍīdāsa pādānām tu khaṇḍarasa nāmnā

original: muhuḥ paśyañchṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭgranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ” //
analyzed: muhur paśyan śṛṇvan rajanicara senā kalakalam jaṭā jūṭ granthim draḍhayati raghūṇām parivṛḍhaḥ

original: atrocyate---iha khalu rasānāṃ virodhitāyā avirodhitāyāśca tridhā vyavasthā /
analyzed: atra ucyate iha khalu rasānām virodhi tāyāḥ avirodhi tāyāḥ ca tridhā vyavasthā
kayoḥ cit ālambana aikyena
kayoḥ cit nairantaryeṇa uti

tathā hāsya raudra bībhatsaiḥ sambhogasya

ālambana aikyane
āśraya aikyena ca vīra bhayānakayoḥ
nairantarya vibhāva aikyābhyām śānta śṛṅgārayoḥ

original: evaṃ ca vīrasya nāyakaniṣṭhatvena bhayānakasya pratināyakaniṣṭhatvena nibandhe bhinānaśrayatvena na virodhaḥ /

analyzed: yaḥ ca nāgānande praśama āśrayasya api jīmūtavāhanasya malayavati anurāgaḥ darśitaḥ

original: atra ca keṣāñcidrūpakāṇāṃ śabdaśleṣamūlatve 'pi rūpakaviśeṣatvādarthālaṅkāramavye gaṇanam /

idam vaktram sākṣāt virahita kalaṅkaḥ śaśadharaḥ sudhā dhārā ādhāraḥ cira pariṇatam bimbam adharaḥ

original: ime netre rātrindivamadhikaśobhe kuvalaye tanurlāvaṇyānāṃ jaladhiravagāhe sukhataraḥ” //

original: iha tūpāyanoderviṣayeṇa tādātmyaṃ prakṛte ca nāyakasaṃbhāvanādāvupayogaḥ /

original: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti punaḥ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ” //

praphulla mallī madhu lampaṭaḥ kim madhuvrataḥ kāṅkṣati vallim anyām
idam padyam mama

original: atra “manaḥ kuto naḥ” ityasya “kāṅkṣati vallimanyām” ityasya caikarūpatayaiva varyavasānātprativastūpamaiva /
analyzed: atra manaḥ kutas naḥ iti asya kāṅkṣati vallim anyām iti asya ca ekarūpa tayā eva varya vasānāt prativastūpamā eva

original: iha tu karṇe madhudhārāvamanasya netraharaṇasya ca sāmyameva,
analyzed: iha tu karṇe madhu dhārā vamanasya netra haraṇasya ca sāmyam eva
na tu aikarūpyam
atra samarthya samarthaka vākyayoḥ
prativastūpamā dṛṣṭāntayoḥ tu na tathā iti bhedaḥ
sambhavan sambhavan vā api kutracid
yatra bimba anubimba tvam bodhayet sā nidarśanā
tatra sambhavat vastu sambandha nidarśanā yathā

original: “ko 'tra bhūmivalaye janān mudhā tāpayan sucirameti sampadam /
analyzed: kaḥ tra bhūmi valaye janān mudhā tāpayan su ciram eti sampadam
vedayan iti dinena bhānumān āsasāda carama acalam tatas
atra raveḥ īdṛśa artha vedana kriyāyām vaktṛ tvena anvayaḥ sambhavati eva
īdṛśa artha jñāpana samartha carama acala prāpti rūpa dharmavat tvāt

original: sa ca raverastācalagamanasya paritāpināṃ vipatprāpteśca bimbapratibimbabhāvaṃ bodhayati /
analyzed: sa ca raveḥ asta acala gamanasya paritāpinām vipad prāpteḥ ca bimba pratibimba bhāvam bodhayati
asambhavat vastu nidarśanā tu ekavākya aneka vākya gata tvena dvividhā
tatra eka vākya gāḥ yathā
kalayati kuvalaya mālā lalitam kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣa vikṣepaḥ
adharaḥ kisalaya līlām ānanam asyāḥ kalānidhe vilāsam

original: atrānyasya dharmaṃ kathamanyo vahatviti kaṭākṣavikṣepādīnāṃ kuvalayamālādigatalalitādīnāṃ
analyzed: atra anyasya dharmam katham anyaḥ vahatu iti kaṭākṣa vikṣepa ādīnām kuvalaya mālā ādi gata lalitā ādīnām
kalanam asambhavāt tat lalitā ādi sadṛśam lalitā ādikam avagamayat kaṭākṣa vikṣepa ādeḥ kuvalaya mālā ādeḥ ca
bimba pratibimba bhāvam bodhayati
yathā vā
prayāṇe tava rāja indra
muktā vairi mṛgī dṛśām
rājahaṃsa gatiḥ padbhyām ānanena śaśi dyutiḥ
atra pādābhyām asambaddha rājahaṃsa gateḥ tthāgaḥ iti tayoḥ tad sambandhaḥ kalpyate
sa ca asambhavan rājahaṃsa gatim iva gatim bodhayati
aneka vākya gāḥ yathā

original: “idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapustapaḥ klapaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati /
analyzed: idam kila avyāja manoharam vapuḥ tapaḥ klapam sādhayitum yaḥ icchati
dhruvam sa nīlotpala patra dhārayā śamī latām chettum ṛṣiḥ vyavasyati
atra cat śabda nirdiṣṭa vākya arthayoḥ abhedena anvayaḥ tādṛśa vapuṣaḥ tapaḥ
klama tva sādhana icchā nīlotpala patna dhārayā śamī latā chedana icchā iva iti bimba pratibimba bhāve paryavasyati
yathā
janma idam vandhya tām nītam bhava bhoga upalipsayā
kāca mūlyena vikrītaḥ hanta
cintāmaṇiḥ mayā

original: atra bhavabhogalobhena janmano vyarthatānayanaṃ kācamūlyena cintāmaṇivikraya iveti paryavasānam /
analyzed: atra bhava bhoga lobhena janmanaḥ vyartha tā nayanam kāca mūlyena cintāmaṇi vikrayaḥ iva iti paryavasānam
evam
kva sūrya prabhavaḥ vaṃśaḥ kva ca alpa viṣayā matiḥ
titīrṣuḥ dustaram mohāt uḍupena asmi sāgaram
atra mad matyā sūrya vaṃśa varṇanam uḍupena sāgara taraṇam iva iti paryavasānam
iyam ca kvacid upameya vṛttasya upamāne sambhave pi bhavati
yathā
yaḥ nubhūtaḥ kuraṅga akṣyāḥ tasyāḥ madhurima adhare
samāsvādi sa mṛdvīkā rase rasa viśāradaiḥ
atra prakṛtasya adharasya madhurima dharmasya drākṣā rase sambhavāt pūrvavat sāmye paryavasānam
mālā rūpā api yathā mama
kṣipasi śukam vṛṣadaṃśaka vadane mṛgam arpayasi mṛgādana radane
vitarasi turagam mahiṣa viṣāṇe nidadhat cetaḥ bhoga vitāne
iha vimba pratibamba tā ākṣepam vinā vākya artha aparyavasānam
dṛṣṭānte tu paryavasitena vākya arthena sāmarthyāt vimba prativimba tā pratyāyanam
na api iyam arthāpattiḥ
tatra hāraḥ yam hariṇa akṣīṇām ityādau sādṛśya paryavasāna abhāvāt
ādikyam upameyasya upamānāt nyūna tā athavā
vyatirekaḥ
sa ca
ekaḥ ukte n ukte hetau punar tridhā
sāmyasya
ākṣepāt ca dvādaśadhā śleṣe pi iti tris aṣṭadhā
pratyekam syāt militvā aṣṭacatvāriṃśat vidhaḥ punar
upameyasya upamānāt ādhikye hetuḥ upameya gatam utkarṣa kāraṇam upamāna gatam nikarṣa kāraṇam ca
tayoḥ dvayoḥ api uktau ekaḥ

original: pratyekaṃ samudāyena vānuktau trividha iti catuvidhe 'pyasminnupamānopameyatvasya nivedanaṃ śabdena arthena ākṣepeṇa ceti dvādaśaprakāro 'pi
analyzed: pratyekam samudāyena vā anuktau trividhe iti catuvidhe pi asmin upamāna upameya tvasya nivedanam śabdena arthena ākṣepeṇa ca iti
api śabdāt aśleṣe pi iti caturviṃśati prakāraḥ

original: upamānānnyūnatāyāmapyanayaiva bhaṅgyā caturviṃśatiprakārateti militvā aṣṭacatvāriṃśatprakāro vyatirekaḥ /
analyzed: upamānāt nyūna tāyām api anayā eva bhaṅgyā caturviṃśati prakāra tā iti militvā aṣṭacatvāriṃśat prakāraḥ vyatirekaḥ
udāharaṇam
akalaṅkam mukham tasyāḥ na kalaṅkī vidhuḥ yathā
atra upameya gatam akalaṅka tvam upamāna gatam ca kalaṅki tvam hetu dvayam api uktam
yathā śabda pratipādanāt ca śābdam aupamyam
atra eva na kalaṅki vidhū upamam iti pāṭhe ārtham
jayati indum kalaṅkinam iti pāṭhe tu iva vat tulya ādi pada virahāt ākṣiptam
atra eva akalaṅka pada tyāge upameya tā utkarṣa kāraṇa anuktiḥ
kalaṅki pada tyāge ca upamāna gata nikarṣa kāraṇa anuktiḥ
dvayoḥ anuktau dvayoḥ anuktiḥ
śleṣe yathā
ati gāḍha guṇāyāḥ ca na abja vat bhaṅgurāḥ guṇāḥ
atra iva arthe vatiḥ iti śābdam aupamyam
utkarṣa nikarṣa kāraṇayoḥ dvayoḥ api uktiḥ
guṇa śabdaḥ śliṣṭaḥ
anye bhedāḥ pūrvavat ūhyāḥ
etāni ca upameyasya upamānāt ādhikye udāraṇāni
nyūna tve diś mātram yathā
kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ u pi śaśī bhūyas bhūyas bhivardhate satyam
virama prasīda sundari
yauvanam anivarti yātam tu
atra upameya bhūta yovana asthairyasya ādhikyam

original: tenātra “upamānādupameyasyādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ” iti keṣāṃcillakṣaṇe “viparyaye vetipadamanarthakam” iti yatkecidāhuḥ /
analyzed: tena atra upamānāt upameyasya ādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ iti keṣāṃcid lakṣaṇe viparyaye vā iti padam anarthakam iti yat kecid āhuḥ
tat na vicāra saham
tathā hi atra adhika nyūna tve sattva asattve eva vivakṣite
atra ca candra apekṣayā yauvanasya asattvam sphuṭam eva
astu vā atra udāharaṇe yathā kathaṃcid ratiḥ
hanūmat ādyaiḥ yaśasā mayā punar dviṣām hasaiḥ dūta pathaḥ sitīkṛtaḥ
ityādiṣu kā gatiḥ iti suṣṭhu uktam nyūna tā athavā iti

original: sahārthasya balādekaṃ yatra syādvācakaṃ dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.54 //
analyzed: saha arthasya balāt ekam yatra syāt vācakam dvayoḥ
sā sahoktiḥ mūla bhūta atiśayoktiḥ yadā bhavet
atiśayoktiḥ api atra abheda adhyavasāya mūlā kārya kāraṇa paurvāparya viparyaya rūpā ca
abheda adhyavasāya mūlā api śleṣa bhittikā anyathā ca
krameṇa udāharam
saha adhara dalena asyāḥ yauvane rāga bhāj priyaḥ
atra rāga pade śleṣaḥ
saha kumuda kadambaiḥ kālam ullāsayantaḥ saha ghana timira oghaiḥ dhairyam utsārayantaḥ
saha sarasija ṣaṇḍaiḥ svāntam āmīlayantaḥ pratidiśam amṛtāṃśoḥ aṃśavaḥ sañcaranti
idam mama
atra ullāsa ādīnām saṃbandhi bhedāt eva bhedaḥ
na tu śliṣṭa tayā
samam eva narādhipena sā guru saṃmoha vilupta cetanā

original: agamat saha tailabindunā nanu dīpārciriva kṣitestalam” //
analyzed: agamat saha taila bindunā nanu dīpa arciḥ iva kṣiteḥ talam
iyam ca mālayā api saṃbhavati
yathā udāhṛte saha kumuda kadambaiḥ ityādau
lakṣmaṇena samam rāmaḥ kānanam gahanam yayau
ityādau ca atiśayokti mūla abhāvāt na ayam alaṅkāraḥ
vinā uktiḥ yat vinā anyena na asādhu anyat asādhu vā
na asādhu aśobhanam na bhavati

original: evaṃ ca yadyapi śobhanatva eva paryavasānaṃ tathāpyaśobhanatvābhāvamukhena śobhanavacanasyāyamabhiprāyo yatkasyacidvarṇanīyasyāśobhanatvaṃ  #
analyzed: evam ca yadi api śobhana tve eva paryavasānam tathā api aśobhana tva abhāva mukhena śobhana vacanasya ayam abhiprāyaḥ yat kasyacid varṇanīyasya aśobhana tvam
tad para sannidheḥ eva doṣaḥ
tasyāḥ punar svabhāvataḥ śobhana tvam eva iti
yathā vinā jalada kālena candraḥ nistandra tām gataḥ
vinā grīṣma uṣmaṇā mañjuḥ vana rājiḥ ajāyata
asādhu aśobhanam yathā
anuyāntyā jana atītam kāntam sādhu tvayā kṛtam

original: kā dinaśrīrvinārkeṇa kā niśā śaśinā vinā” //
analyzed: kā dina śrīḥ vinā arkeṇa kā niśā śaśinā vinā

original: “nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yayā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam /
analyzed: nirarthakam janma gatam nalinyāḥ yayā na dṛṣṭam tuhināṃśu bimbam

original: utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva dṛṣṭā vinidrā nalinī na yena” //
analyzed: utpattiḥ indoḥ api niṣphalā eva dṛṣṭā vinidrā nalinī na yena
atra paraspara avinokti bhaṅgyā cakatkāra atiśayaḥ
vinā śabda prayoga abhāve vinā artha vivakṣā ayam vinā uktiḥ evā iyam

original: evaṃ sahoktirapi sahaśabdaprayogābhāve 'pi sahārthavivakṣāyāṃ bhavatīti bodhyam /
analyzed: evam saha uktiḥ api saha śabda prayoga abhāve saha artha vivakṣāyām bhavati iti bodhyam
samāsoktiḥ samaiḥ yatra kārya liṅga viśeṣaṇaiḥ
vyavahāra samāropaḥ prastute nyasya vastunaḥ
atra samena kāryeṇa prastute prastuta vyavahāra samāropaḥ
yathā
vyādhūya yat vasanam ambuja locanāyāḥ vakṣojayoḥ kanaka kumbha vilāsa bhājoḥ
āliṅgasi prasabham aṅgam aśeṣam asyāḥ dhanyaḥ tvam eva malaya acala gandhavāha
atra gandhavāhe haṭha kāmuka vyavahāra samāropaḥ
liṅga sāmyena yathā
asamāpta jigīṣasya strī cintā kā manasvinaḥ

original: anākramya jagatkṛtsnaṃ no sandhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ” //
analyzed: an ākramya jagat kṛtsnam no sandhyām bhajate raviḥ
atra pum strī liṅga mātreṇa ravi sandhyayoḥ nāyaka nāyikā vyavahāraḥ
viśeṣaṇa sāmyam tu śliṣṭa tayā
sādhāraṇyena
aupamya garbha tvena ca tridhā
śliṣṭa tayā yathā mama
vikasita mukhīm rāga āsaṅgāt ralat timira āvṛtim dinakara kara spṛṣṭām aindrīm nirīkṣya diśam puras

original: jaraṭhalavalīpāṇḍucchāyo bhṛśaṃ kaluṣāntaraḥ śrayati haritaṃ hanta /
analyzed: jaraṭha lavalī pāṇḍu chāyaḥ bhṛśam kaluṣa antaraḥ śrayati haritam hanta
prācetasīm tuhina dyutiḥ
atra mukha rāga ādi śabdānām śliṣṭa tā

original: atraiva hi “timirāvṛtim” ityatra “timirāśukam” iti pāṭhe etadeśasya rūpaṇe 'pi samāsoktireva,
analyzed: atra eva hi timira āvṛtim iti atra timira āśukam iti pāṭhe etad deśasya rūpaṇe samāsoktiḥ eva
na tu eka deśa vivarti rūpakam

original: tatra hi timirāṃśukayo rūpyarūpakabhāvo dvayorāvarakatvena sphuṭasādṛśyatayā parasācivyamanapekṣyāpi svamātraviśrānta iti na samāsoktibuddhiṃ  #
analyzed: tatra hi timira aṃśukayoḥ rūpya rūpaka bhāvaḥ dvayoḥ āvaraka tvena sphuṭa sādṛśya tayā para sācivyam an apekṣya api sva mātra viśrāntaḥ iti na samāsokti buddhim
vyāhantum īśaḥ

original: yatra tu rūpyarūpakayoḥ sādṛśyamasphuṭaṃ tatraikadeśāntararūpaṇaṃ vinā tadasaṅgataṃ syādityaśābdamapyekadeśāntararūpaṇamārthamapekṣata eveti  #
analyzed: yatra tu rūpya rūpakayoḥ sādṛśyam asphuṭam tatra eka deśa antara rūpaṇam vinā tat asaṅgatam syāt iti aśābdam api eka deśa antara rūpaṇam ārtham apekṣate eva iti
tatra eka deśa vivarti rūpakam eva
yathā
jassa kare kuṇantassa

original: ragasaṃmuhī vi sahasā parammuhī hoi riuseṇā” //
analyzed: vi sahasā parammuhī hoi
atra raṇa antar purayoḥ sādṛśyam asphuṭam eva

original: kvacicca yatra sphuṭasādṛśyānāmapi bahūnāṃ rūpaṇaṃ śābdamekadeśasya cārthaṃ tatraikadeśavivarti rūpakameva /
analyzed: kvacid ca yatra sphuṭa sādṛśyānām api bahūnām rūpaṇam śābdam eka deśasya ca artham tatra eka deśa vivarti rūpakam eva
rūpaka pratīteḥ vyāpi tayā samāsokti pratīti tirodhāyaka tvāt

original: nanvasti raṇāntaḥ purayorapi sukhasaṃcāratayā sphuṭaṃ sādṛśyamiti cet?
analyzed: nanu asti raṇa antar purayoḥ api sukha saṃcāra tayā sphuṭam sādṛśyam iti ced
satyam uktam
asti eva kiṃtu vākya artha paryālocana sāpekṣam
na khalu nirapekṣam
mukha candra ādeḥ manohara tva ādi vat raṇa antar purayoḥ svatas sukha sañcāra tva abhāvāt
sādharaṇyena yathā
udite vāsara adhīśe smerā ajani sarojinī

original: atra nisargetyādiviśeṣaṇasāmyātsarojinyāṃ nāyikāvyavahārapratītau strīmātragāminaḥ smeratvadharmasya samāropaḥ kāraṇam /
analyzed: atra nisarga ityādi viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt sarojinyām nāyikā vyavahāra pratītau strī mātra gāminaḥ smera tva dharmasya samāropaḥ kāraṇam
tena vinā viśeṣaṇa sāmya mātreṇa nāyikā vyavahāra pratīteḥ asambhavāt
aupamya garbha tvam punar tridhā sambhavati
upamā rūpa saṅkara garbha tvāt
tatra upamā garbha tve yathā
adanta prabhā puṣpa citā pāṇi pallava śobhinī
keśapāśa ali vṛndena su veṣā hariṇa īkṣaṇā
atra su veṣa tva vaśāt prathamam danta prabhāḥ puṣpāṇi iva iti upamā garbha tvena samāsaḥ

original: anantaraṃ ca dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiścitetyādisamāsāntarāśrayeṇa samānaviśeṣaṇamahātmyāddhariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ latāvyavahārapratītiḥ /
analyzed: anantaram ca danta prabhā sadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiḥ citā ityādi samāsa antara āśrayeṇa samāna viśeṣaṇa mahātmyāt hariṇa īkṣaṇāyām latā vyavahāra pratītiḥ
rūpaka garbha tve yathā lāvaṇya madhubhiḥ pūrṇam ityādi
saṅkara garbha tve yathā danta prabhā puṣpe ityādi
su veṣāḥ iti atra parītāḥ iti pāṭhe hi upamā rūpaka sādhaka abhāvāt saṅkara samāśrayaṇam
samāsa antaram pūrvavat

original: eṣu ca yaṣāṃ mate upamāsaṅkarayorekadeśavivartitā nāsti tanmate ādyatṛtīyayoḥ samāsoktiḥ /
analyzed: eṣu ca yaṣām mate upamā saṅkarayoḥ eka deśa vivarti tā na asti tad mate ādya tṛtīyayoḥ samāsoktiḥ
dvitīyaḥ tu prakāraḥ eva
paryālocane tu ādye prakāre eva deśa vivartinī upamā eva aṅgīkartum ucitā
anyathā
aindram dhanuḥ pāṇḍu payodhareṇa śarad dadhāna ārdra nakha kṣata ābham
pramodayantī sa kalaṅkam indum tāpam raveḥ abhyadhikam cakāra
iti atra katham śaradi nāyikā vyavahāra pratītiḥ
nāyikā payodhareṇa ārdra nakha kṣata ābha śakracāpa dhāraṇā sambhavāt

original: nanu “ārdranakhakṣatābham” ityatra sthitamapyupamānatvaṃ vastuparyālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi sañcāraṇīyam /
analyzed: nanu ārdra nakha kṣata ābham iti atra sthitam api upamāna tvam vastu paryālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi sañcāraṇīyam

original: yathā--“dadhnā juhoti” ityādau havanasyānyathāsiddherdadhni sañcāryate vidhiḥ /
analyzed: yathā dadhnā juhoti ityādau havanasya anyathā siddheḥ dadhni sañcāryate vidhiḥ
evam ca indracāpa ābham ārdra nakha kṣatam dadhānā iti pratītiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced
na evaṃvidha nirvāhe kaṣṭa sṛṣṭi kalpanāt eka deśa vivarti upamā aṅgīkārasya eva jyāyaḥ tvāt
astu vā atra yathā kathañcid samāsoktiḥ
netraiḥ iva utpalaiḥ padmaiḥ ityādau ca anya gati asambhavāt

original: kiṃ copamāyāṃ vyavahārapratīterabhāvātkathaṃ tadupajīvikāyāḥ samāsokteḥ praveśaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca upamāyām vyavahāra pratīteḥ abhāvāt katham tad upajīvikāyāḥ samāsokteḥ praveśaḥ
yat āhuḥ
tattvam aupamye yat pratīyate
tat na aupamyam samāsoktiḥ eka deśopamā sphuṭā
evam ca upamā rūpakayoḥ eka deśa vivarti tā aṅgīkāre tad mūla saṅkare pi samāsokteḥ apraveśaḥ nyāya siddhaḥ eva

original: tenaupamyagarbhaviśeṣaṇotthāpitatvaṃ nāsyā viṣaya iti viśeṣaṇasāmye śliṣṭaveśeṣaṇotthāpitā sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇotthāpitā ceti dvidhā /

tad kānti jālaiḥ prasṛtaiḥ tad aṅgeṣu āpāṇḍu tā kuḍmala tā akṣi padme
atra rūpaka vaśāt vicchittiḥ
yathā vā
yatra patati abalānām dṛṣṭiḥ niśitāḥ patanti tatra śarāḥ
tat ca aparopita śaraḥ dhāvati āsām puras smaraḥ manye
atra kavi prauḍha ukti vaśāt vicchittiḥ
utprekṣāyām anaḥ cita tayā pratītiḥ
iha tu niścita tayā iti ubhayoḥ bhedaḥ
abhedena abhidhā hetuḥ hetoḥ hetumatā saha
yathā mama tāruṇyasya vilāsaḥ iti atra vaśīkaraṇa hetuḥ nāyikā vaśīkaraṇa tvena uktā
vilāsa hāsayoḥ tu adhyavasāya mūlaḥ yamaṅkāraḥ
anukūlam prātikūlyam anukūla anubandhi ced
yathā a kupitā asi yadā tanvi
nidhāya karaja kṣatam
badhāna bhuja pāśābhyām kaṇṭham asya dṛḍham tadā

original: asya ca vicchittiviśeṣasya sarvālaṅkāravilakṣaṇatvena sphuraṇātpṛthagalaṅkāratvameva nyāyyam /
analyzed: asya ca vicchitti viśeṣasya sarva alaṅkāra vilakṣaṇa tvena sphuraṇāt pṛthak alaṅkāra tvam eva nyāyyam
vastunaḥ vaktum iṣṭasya viśeṣa pratipattaye
niṣedha ābhāsaḥ ākṣepaḥ vakṣyamāṇa ukta gaḥ dvidhā

original: tatra vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye kvacitsarvasyāpi sāmānyataḥ sūcitasya niṣedhaḥ kvacidaṃśoktāvaṃśāntare niṣadha iti dvau bhedau /
analyzed: tatra vakṣyamāṇa viṣaye kvacid sarvasya api sāmānyatas sūcitasya niṣedhaḥ kvacid aṃśa uktau aṃśa antare niṣadhaḥ iti dvau bhedau
ukta viṣaye ca kvacid vastu svarūpasya niṣedhaḥ
kvacid vastu kathanasya iti dvau
iti ākṣepasya catvāraḥ bhedāḥ
krameṇa yathā
smara śara śata vidhurāyāḥ bhaṇāmi saṃkhyāḥ kṛte kim api
kṣaṇam iha viśramya sakhe
nirdaya hṛdayasya kim vadāmi athavā

original: atra sakhyā virahasya sāmānyataḥ sūcitasya vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye niṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: atra sakhyāḥ virahasya sāmānyatas sūcitasya vakṣyamāṇa viṣaye niṣedhaḥ
tava virahe hariṇa akṣī nirīkṣya navamālikām dalitām
hanta nitāntam idānīm āḥ kim hata jalpitaiḥ athavā
atra mariṣyati iti aṃśaḥ na uktaḥ

original: “bālaa / ṇāhaṃ dūtī tua piosi tti ṇa maha vāvāro /
analyzed: bālaa  ṇa aham dūtī tua piosi tti ṇa maha

original: sā marai tujbhkta aaso etnaṃ dhammakkharaṃ bhaṇimo” //
analyzed: sā marai dhammakkharam bhaṇimaḥ
atra dūtī tvasya vastunaḥ niṣedhaḥ
virahe tava tanvaṅgī katham kṣapayatu kṣapām
dāruṇa vyavasāyasya puras te bhaṇitena kim
atra kathanasya uktasya eva niṣedhaḥ
prathama udāharaṇe saṃkhyā avaśyambhāvi maraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ pratīyate
dvitīye śakya vaktavya tva ādi
tṛtīye dūtī tve yathārtha vādi tvam
caturthe duḥ khasya atiśayaḥ
na ca ayam vihita niṣedhaḥ
atra niṣedhasya ābhāsa tvāt

original: aniṣṭasya tathārthasya vidhyābhāsaḥ paro mataḥ // VisSd_10.65 //
analyzed: aniṣṭasya tathā arthasya vidhi ābhāsaḥ paraḥ mataḥ
tathā iti pūrvavat viśeṣa pratipattaye
yathā
gaccha gacchasi ced kānta
panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ

original: mamāpi. janma tatraiva bhūyādyatra gato bhavān” //
analyzed: mama api janma tatra eva bhūyāt yatra gataḥ bhavān
atra aniṣṭa tvāt ramanasya vidhiḥ praskhalat rūpaḥ niṣedhe paryavasyati
viśeṣaḥ ca gamanasya atyanta parihārya tva rūpaḥ pratīyate
vibhāvanā vinā hetum kārya utpattiḥ yat ucyate
ukta anukta nimitta tvāt dvidhā sā parikīrtitā

original: vinā kāraṇamupanibadhyamāno 'pi kāryodayaḥ kiñcidanyatkāraṇamapekṣyaiva bhavituṃ yuktaḥ /
analyzed: vinā kāraṇam upanibadhyamānaḥ api kārya udayaḥ kiñcid anyat kāraṇam apekṣya eva bhavitum yuktaḥ
tat ca kāraṇa antaram kvacid uktam kvacid anuktam iti dvidhā
yathā
anāyāsa kṛśam madhyama śaṅkā tarale dṛśau
abhūṣaṇa manohāri vapuḥ vayasi subhruvaḥ
atra vayaḥ rūpa nimittam uktam
atra eva vapuḥ bhāti mṛgī dṛśaḥ iti pāṭhe nu ktam
sati hetau phala abhāvaḥ viśeṣa uktiḥ tathā dvidhā
tathā iti ukta anukta nimitta tvāt
tatra ukta nimittā yathā
dhaninaḥ pi nirunmādāḥ yuvānaḥ pi na cañcalāḥ
prabhavaḥ pi apramattāḥ te mahā mahima śālinaḥ
atra mahā mahimaśāli tvam nimittam uktam

original: atraiva caturthapāde “kiyantaḥ santi bhūtale” iti pāṭhe tvanuktam /
analyzed: atrā eva caturtha pāde kiyantaḥ santi bhū tale iti pāṭhe tu anuktam
acintya nimitta tvam ca anukta nimittasya eva bhedaḥ iti pṛthak na uktam
yathā
sa jayati jaganti kusumāyudhaḥ

original: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śambhunā na hṛtaṃ balam” //
analyzed: haratā api tanum yasya śambhunā na hṛtam balam
atra tanu haraṇena api bala āharaṇe nimittam acintyam
iha ca kārya abhāvaḥ kārya viruddha sadbhāva mukhena api nibaddhyate
vibhāvanāyām api kāraṇa abhāvaḥ kāraṇa viruddha sadbhāva mukhena
evam ca yaḥ kaumāra haraḥ ityādeḥ ukaṇṭhā kāraṇa viruddhasya nibandhanāt vibhāvanā

original: “yaḥ kaumāra-” ityādeḥ kāraṇasya ca kāryaviruddhāyā utkaṇṭhāyā nibandhanādviśeṣoktiḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ kaumāraḥ ityādeḥ kāraṇasya ca kārya viruddhāyāḥ utkaṇṭhāyāḥ nibandhanāt viśeṣa uktiḥ
evam ca atra vibhāvanā viśeṣa uktyoḥ saṅkaraḥ
śuddha udāharaṇam tu mṛgyam
jātiḥ caturbhiḥ jāti ādyaiḥ guṇaḥ guṇa ādibhiḥ tribhiḥ

original: kriyā kriyādravyābhyāṃ yaddravyaṃ dravyeṇa vā mithaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā kriyā dravyābhyām yat dravyam dravyeṇa vā mithas
viruddham iva bhāseta sau daśa ākṛtiḥ
krameṇa yathā
tava virahe malaya marut dava analaḥ śaśi rucaḥ pi sa ūṣmāṇaḥ
hṛdaya mali rutam api bhinte nalinī dalam api nidāgha ravi rasyāḥ
santata musala āsaṅgāt vahutara gṛhakarma ghaṭanayā nṛpate

original: dvijapatnīnāṃ kaṭhināḥ sati bhavati karāḥ sarojasukumārāḥ” //
analyzed: dvija patnīnām kaṭhināḥ sati bhavati karāḥ saroja sukumārāḥ
ajasya gṛhṇataḥ janma nirīhasya hata dviṣaḥ
svapataḥ jāgarūkasya yāthārthyam veda kaḥ tava
vallabha utsaṅga saṅgena vinā hariṇa cakṣuṣaḥ
rākā vibhāvarī jāniḥ viṣa jvālā ākulaḥ bhavat
nayana yuga āsecanakam mānasa vṛttayā api duṣprāpam

original: rūpamidaṃ madirākṣyā madayati hṛdayaṃ dunoti ca me //
analyzed: rūpam idam madirā akṣyāḥ madayati hṛdayam dunoti ca me
tvad vāji ityādi
vallabha utsaṅga etyādi śloke caturtha pāde madhyandina dinādhipaḥ iti pāṭhe dravyayoḥ virodhaḥ

original: atra “tava viraha-” ityādau pavanādīnāṃ bahuvyaktivācakatvājjātiśabdānāṃ davānaloṣmahṛdayabhedanasūryairjātiguṇakriyādravyarūpairanyonyaṃ virodho  #
analyzed: atra tava virahaḥ ityādau pavana ādīnām bahu vyakti vācaka tvāt jāti śabdānām dava anala ūṣma hṛdayabhedana sūryaiḥ jāti guṇa kriyā dravya rūpaiḥ anyonyam virodhaḥ
mukhataḥ ābhāsate
viraha hetuka tvāt samādhānam
ajasya ityādau aja tva ādi guṇasya janma prahaṇa ādi kriyayā virodhaḥ
bhagavataḥ prabhāvasya atiśāyi tvāt tu samādhānam

original: “tvadvāji-” ityādau “haro 'pi śirasā gaṅgāṃ na dhatte” iti virodhaḥ,
analyzed: tvad vāji ityādau śirasā gaṅgām na dhatte iti virodhaḥ
tvad vāji iti ādika viprauḍha uktyā tu samādhānam
spaṣṭam anyat
vibhāvanāyām kāraṇa abhāvena upanibadhyamāna tvāt kāryam eva bādhya tvena pratīyate
viśoṣa uktau ca kārya abhāvena kāraṇam eva
iha tu anyonyam dvayoḥ api bādhya tvam iti bhedaḥ
kārya kāraṇayoḥ bhinna deśa tāyām asaṅgatiḥ
yathā

original: “sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarā sā pīnonnatimatpayodharayugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam /
analyzed: sā bālā vayam a pragalbha manasaḥ sā strī vayam kātarā sā pīna unnatimat payodhara yugam dhatte sakhedāḥ vayam

original: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ doṣairanyajanāśrayairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam” //
analyzed: sā ākrāntā jaghana sthalena guruṇā gantum na śaktā vayam doṣaiḥ anya janāśrayaiḥ apaṭavaḥ jātāḥ smaḥ iti adbhutam
asyāḥ ca apavādaka tvāt eka deśa sthayoḥ virodhe virodha alaṅkāraḥ

original: guṇau kriye vā cetsyātāṃ viruddhe hetukāryayoḥ // VisSd_10.69 //
analyzed: guṇau kriye vā ced syātām viruddhe hetu kāryayoḥ

original: atra kāraṇarūpāsilatāyāḥ “kāraṇaguṇā hi kāryaguṇamārabhante” iti sthaterviruddhā śuklayaśasa utpattiḥ /

ānandam amandam imam kuvalaya dala locane
dadāsi tvam

ayam ratnākaraḥ mbhodhiḥ iti asevi dhana āśayā

original: “mūṣikeṇa daṇḍo bhakṣita” ityanena tatsahacaritamapūpabhakṣaṇamarthādāyātaṃ bhavatīti niyatasamānanyāyādarthāntaramāpatatītyeṣa nyāyo daṇḍāpūpikā

atra ca kvacid prākaraṇikāt arthāt a prākaraṇikasya arthasya āpatanam kvacid a prākaraṇika artha t prākaraṇika arthasya iti dvau bhedau

original: atra ca samānanyāyasya śleṣamūlatve vaicitryaviśeṣo yathodāhṛte-“hāro 'yam-” ityādau na cedamanumānam,

samāna nyāyasya sambandha rūpa tva abhāvāt
vikalpaḥ tulya balayoḥ virodhaḥ taḥ

original: yathā--“namayantu śirāṃsi dhanūṃṣi vā karṇapūrīkriyantāmājñā maurvyo vā” /

original: atra śirasāṃ dhanuṣāṃ ca namanayoḥ sandhivigrahopalakṣaṇatvāt sandhivigrahayoścaikadā kartumaśakyatvādvirodhaḥ,
analyzed: atra śirasām dhanuṣām ca namanayoḥ sandhi vigraha upalakṣaṇa tvāt sandhi vigrahayoḥ ca ekadā kartum aśakya tvāt virodhaḥ
sa ca eka pakṣa āśrayaṇa paryavasānaḥ

original: tulyabalatvaṃ cātra dhanuḥ śironamanayordūyorapi spardhayā sambhāvyamānatvāt /

cāturyam ca atra aupamya garbha tvena
evam karṇapūrīkriyantām iti atra api evam
yuṣmākam kurutām bhava atiśamanam netre tanuḥ vā hareḥ
atra śleṣa avaṣṭambhena cāru tvam
dīyatām ajitam vittam devāya brāhmaṇāya vā
iti atra cāturya abhāvāt na ayam alaṅkāraḥ
samuccayaḥ yam ekasmin sati kāryasya sādhake

original: guṇau kriye vā yugapatsyātāṃ yadvā guṇakriye /

original: pratyaṅgaṃ dahasīti me tvamapi ceduddāmadāvāgniva- nmattoyaṃ malinātmako vanacaraḥ kiṃ vakṣyate kokilaḥ” //

original: atra dāhe ekasmiṃścandanakṣmābhṛjjanmarūpe kāraṇe satyapi dākṣiṇyādīnāṃ hetvantarāṇāmupādānam /

original: “śaśī divasadhūsaro galitayauvanā kāminī saro vigatavārijaṃ mukhamanakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ /

original: prabhūrdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅganagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me” //

original: iha kecidāhuḥ--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ śobhanatvaṃ khalasyāśobhanatvaṃ ceti sadasadyogaḥ”

original: iti anye tu--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ svataḥ śobhanatvaṃ dhūsaratvādīnāṃ tvaśobhanatvamiti sadasadyogaḥ” /

original: atra hi śaśiprabhṛtiṣu dhūsaratvāderatyantacitatvamiti vicchittiviśeṣasyaiva camatkāravidhāyitvam /

original: “nṛpāṅganagataḥ khala” iti tu kramabhedādduṣṭatvamāvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasyaiva śobhanatvena prakramāditi /

original: “lāṅgūlenābhihatya kṣititalamasakṛddārayannagrapadbhyā- mātmanyevāvalīya drutamatha gaganaṃ protpatan vikrameṇa /
analyzed: lāṅgūlena abhihatya kṣiti talam asakṛt dārayan agra padbhyām mā ātmani evā avalīya drutam atha gaganam protpatan vikrameṇa

original: sphūrjaddhuṅkāradhoṣaḥ pratidiśamakhilān drāvayanneṣa jantūna kopāviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanamaruṇocchūnacakṣūstarakṣuḥ” //
analyzed: sphūrjat huṅkāra dhoṣaḥ pratidiśam akhilān drāvayan eṣa jantūn kopa āviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanam aruṇa ucchūna cakṣūḥ tarakṣuḥ
adbhutasya padārthasya bhūtasya atha bhaviṣyataḥ
yat pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam tat bhāvikam udāhṛtam
yathā
muniḥ jayati yogi indraḥ mahātmā kumbhasambhavaḥ
yena eka culuke dṛṣṭau divyau tau matsya kacchapau
yathā vā
āsīt añjanam atrā iti paśyāmi tava locane
bhāvi bhūṣaṇa sambhārām sākṣātkurve tava ākṛtim
na ca ayam prasāda ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ
bhūta bhāvinoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇa tve tasya ahetu tvāt
na ca adbhutaḥ rasaḥ
vismayam pratyasya hetu tvāt
na ca atiśayoktiḥ alaṅkāraḥ
adhyavasāya abhāvāt
na ca bhrāntimān
bhūta bhāvinoḥ bhūta bhāvi tayā eva prakāśanāt
na ca svabhāva uktiḥ
tasya laukika vastu gata sūkṣma dharma svabhāvasya eva yathāvat varṇanam svarūpam
asya tu vastunaḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇa svarūpaḥ vicchitti viśeṣaḥ sti iti

original: yadi punarvastunaḥ kvacitsvabhāvoktāvapyasyā vicchitteḥ sambhavastadobhayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: yadi punar vastunaḥ kvacid svabhāva uktau api asyāḥ vicchitteḥ sambhavaḥ tadā ubhayoḥ saṅkaraḥ
an ātapattraḥ pi ayam atra lakṣyate sita ātapattraiḥ iva sarvatas vataḥ
acāmaraḥ pi eṣa sadā eva vījyate vilāsa bāla vyajanena kaḥ pi ayam
atra pratyakṣāyamāṇasya eva varṇanāt na ayam alaṅkāraḥ
varṇanā vaśena pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvasya eva svarūpa tvāt

original: yatpunarapratyakṣāyamāṇasyāpi varṇane pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ tatrāyamalaṅkāro bhavituṃ yuktaḥ,
analyzed: yat punar a pratyakṣāyamāṇasya api varṇane pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam tatra ayam alaṅkāraḥ bhavitum yuktaḥ
yathā udāhṛte āsīt añjanam ityādau
loka atiśaya saṃpatti varṇana udāttam ucyate

original: yadvāpi prastutasyāṅgaṃ mahatāṃ caritaṃ bhavet // VisSd_10.94 //
analyzed: yat vā api prastutasya aṅgam mahatām caritam bhavet
krameṇa udāharaṇam
adhas kṛta ambhodhara maṇḍalānām yasyām śaśāṅka upala kuṭṭīmānām
jyotsnā nipātāt kṣara kṣatām payobhiḥ kelī vanam vṛddhim urīkaroti
nābhi prabhinna amburuha āsanena saṃstūyamānaḥ prathamena dhātrā
amum yugānta ucita yoga nidraḥ saṃhṛtya lokān puruṣaḥ dhiśate
rasa bhāvau tad ābhāsau bhāvasya praśamaḥ tathā
guṇībhūta tvam āyānti yadā alaṅkṛtayaḥ tadā
rasavat preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhitam iti kramāt
tad ābhāsau rasa ābhāsaḥ bhāva ābhāsaḥ ca
tatra rasa yogāt rasa vat alaṅkāraḥ yathā
ayam sa rasanā utkarṣaḥ ityādi
atra śṛṅgāraḥ karuṇasya aṅgam
evam anyatra api
prakṛṣṭa priya tvāt preyaḥ
yathā mama
āmīlita alasa vivatita tāraka akṣīm mad kaṇṭha bandhana dara ślatha bāhu vallīm
prasveda vāri kaṇikā cita ghaṇḍa bimbām saṃsmṛtya tām aniśam eti na śāntimantaḥ
atra saṃbhoga śṛṅgāraḥ smaraṇa ākhya bhāvasya aṅgam
sa ca vipralambhasya
ūrjaḥ balam anaucitya pravṛttau tat atra asti iti ūrjasvi
yathā
vane khila kalā āsaktāḥ parihṛtya nija striyaḥ
tvad vairi vanitā vṛnde pulindāḥ kurvate ratim
atra śṛṅgāra ābhāsaḥ rāja viṣayaka rati bhāvasya aṅgam
evam bhāva ābhāsaḥ pi
samāhitam parihāraḥ
yathā avirala karavāla kampanaiḥ bhrukuṭī tarjana garjanaiḥ muhur

original: dadṛśe tava vairiṇāṃ madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tavekṣaṇe kṣaṇāt” //
analyzed: dadṛśe tava vairiṇām madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tava īkṣaṇe kṣaṇāt
atra mad ākhya bhāvasya praśamaḥ rāja viṣaya rati bhāvasya aṅgam

original: bhāvasya codaye saṃdhau miśratve ta tadākhyakāḥ // VisSd_10.96 //
analyzed: bhāvasya ca udaye saṃdhau miśra tve ta tad ākhyakāḥ
tad ākhyakāḥ bhāva udaya bhāva saṃdhi bhāva śabala nāmānaḥ laṅkārāḥ
krameṇa udāharaṇam madhu pāna pravṛttāḥ te suhṛdbhiḥ saha vairiṇaḥ

original: śrutvā kuto 'pi tvannama lebhire viṣamāṃ daśām” //
analyzed: śrutvā kutas lebhire viṣamām daśām
atra trāsa udayaḥ rāja viṣaya rati bhāvasya aṅgam
janma antarīṇa ramaṇasya aṅga saṅga samutsukā

original: salajjā cāntike sakhyāḥ pātu naḥ pārvatī sadā” //
analyzed: sa lajjā ca antike sakhyāḥ pātu naḥ pārvatī sadā
atra autsukya lajjayoḥ ca saṃdhiḥ devatā viṣaya rati bhāvasya aṅgam
paśyet kaścid cala capala re

original: kā tvārahaṃ kumārī hastālambaṃ vitara hahahā vyutkramaḥ kvāsi yāsi /
analyzed: kā kumārī hasta ālambam vitara hahahā vyutkramaḥ kva asi yāsi
ittham pṛthvīparivṛḍha
bhavat vidviṣaḥ raṇya vṛtteḥ kanyā kañcid phala kisalayāni ādadānā abhidhatte
atra śaṅkā asūyā dhṛti smṛti śrama dainya vibodha autsukyānām śabala tā rāja viṣaya rati bhāvasya aṅgam
iha kecid āhuḥ vācya vācaka rūpa alaṅkaraṇa mukhena rasa ādi upakārakāḥ eva alaṅkārāḥ

original: rasādayastu vācyavācakābhyāmupakāryā eveti na teṣāmaṅkāratā bhavituṃ yuktā” iti /
analyzed: rasa ādayaḥ tu vācya vācakābhyām upakāryāḥ eva iti na teṣām aṅkāra tā bhavitum yuktāḥ iti
anye tu rasa ādi upakāra mātreṇa iha alaṅkṛti vyupadeśaḥ bhāktaḥ cirantana prasiddhyā aṅgīkāryaḥ eva iti

original: apare ca--“rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkāratvaṃ mukhyato rūpakādau tu vācyādyupadhānam,
analyzed: apare ca rasa ādi upakāra mātreṇa alaṅkāra tvam mukhyatas rūpaka ādau tu vācya ādi upadhānam
ajagala stana nyānena iti
abhiyuktāḥ tu sva vyañjaka vācya vācaka ādi upakṛtaiḥ aṅga bhūtaiḥ rasa ādibhiḥ aṅginaḥ rasa ādeḥ vācya vācaka upaskāra dvāreṇa upakurvadbhiḥ alaṅkṛti vyapadeśaḥ
samāsoktau tu nāyikā ādi vyavahāra mātrasya eva alaṅkṛti tā
na tu āsvādasya
tasya ukta rīti virahāt iti manyante
atas eva dhvani kāreṇa uktam
pradhāne vākya arthe yatra aṅgam tu rasa ādayaḥ
kāvye tasmin alaṅkāraḥ rasa ādiḥ iti me matiḥ

original: yadi ca rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkṛtitvaṃ tadā vācakadiṣvapi tathā prasajyeta /
analyzed: yadi ca rasa ādi upakāra mātreṇa alaṅkṛti tvam tadā vāca kadiṣu api tathā prasajyeta
evam ca yat ca kaiścid uktam rasa ādīnām aṅgi tve rasavat ādi alaṅkāraḥ

original: aṅgatve tu dvitīyodāttālaṅkāraḥ” iti tadapi parāstam /
analyzed: aṅga tve tu dvitīya udātta alaṅkāraḥ iti tat api parāstam
yadi ete eva alaṅkārāḥ paraspara vimiśritāḥ
tadā pṛthak alaṅkārau saṃsṛṣṭiḥ saṅkaraḥ tathā

original: yathā laukikālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśraṇe pṛthakcārutvena pṛthagalaṅkāratvaṃ tathoktarūpāṇāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśratve saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkārākhyau  #
analyzed: yathā laukika alaṅkārāṇām api paraspara miśraṇe pṛthak cāru tvena pṛthak alaṅkāra tvam tathā ukta rūpāṇām kāvya alaṅkārāṇām api paraspara miśra tve saṃsṛṣṭi saṅkāra ākhyau
pṛthak alaṅkārau
tatra
mithas sthitiḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ ucyate
eteṣām śabda artha alaṅkārāṇām
yathā
devaḥ pāyāt apāyāt naḥ smera indīvara locanaḥ
atra pāyāt apāyāt iti yamakam
saṃsāra ityādau ca anuprāsaḥ iti śabda alaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
dvitīye pāde upamā
dvitīya ardhe ca rūpakam iti artha alaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
evam ubhayoḥ sthita tvāt śabda artha alaṅkāra saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
aṅga aṅgi tve laṅkṛtīnām tadvat eka āśraya sthitau

original: saṃdigdhatve ca bhavati saṅkarastrividhaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_10.98 //
analyzed: saṃdigdha tve ca bhavati saṅkaraḥ trividhaḥ punar
aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ yathā
ākṛṣṭi vega vigalat bhujaga indra bhoga nirmoka paṭṭa pariveṣṭanāya amburāśeḥ
mantha vyathā vyupaśama artham iva āśu yasya mandākinī ciram aveṣṭata pāda mūle
atra nirmoka paṭṭa apahnavena mandākinyāḥ āropaḥ iti apahnutiḥ

original: sā ca mandā kinyā vastuvṛttena yatpādamūlaveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanamiti śleṣamutthāpayatīti tasyāṅgam /
analyzed: sā ca mandā kinyāḥ vastu vṛttena yat pāda mūla veṣṭanam tat caraṇa mūla veṣṭanam iti śleṣam utthāpayati iti tasya aṅgam
śleṣan ca pāda mūla veṣṭanam eva caraṇa mūla veṣṭa dam iti atiśayoktar eṅgam
atiśayoktiḥ ca mantha vyathā vyupaśama artham iva iti utprekṣāyāḥ aṅgam
utprekṣā ca amburāśi mandākinyoḥ nāyaka nāyikā vyavahāram gamayati iti samāsokteḥ aṅgam
yathā vā
anurāgavatī saṃdhyām divasaḥ tat puras saraḥ
aho daiva gatiḥ citrā tathā api na samāgamaḥ
atra samāsokti viśeṣokteḥ aṅgam
saṃdeha saṅkaraḥ yathā
idam ābhāti gagane bhindānam santatam tamaḥ
a manda nayana ānda karam maṇḍalam aindavam
atra kim mukhasya candra tayā adhvasānāt atiśayoktiḥ
uta idam iti mukham nirdiśya candra tva āropāt rūpakam

original: athavā idamiti mukhasya candramaṇḍalasya ca dvayorapi prakṛtayorekadharmābhisaṃbandhāttulyayogitā,
analyzed: athavā idam iti mukhasya candra maṇḍalasya ca dvayoḥ api prakṛtayoḥ eka dharma abhisaṃbandhāt tulya yogitā
āhosvit candrasya aprakṛta tvāt dīpakam
kim vā viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt aprastutasya mukhasya gamya tvāt samāsoktiḥ
yat vā aprastuta candra varṇanayā prastutasya mukhasya avagatiḥ iti aprastuta praśaṃsā

original: yadvā manmathoddīpanaḥ kālaḥ svakāryabhūtacandravarṇanāmukhena vaṇita iti paryāyoktiriti bahūnāmalaṅkarāṇāṃ saṃdehātsaṃdehasaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: yat vā manmatha uddīpanaḥ kālaḥ sva kārya bhūta candra varṇanā mukhena vaṇitaḥ iti paryāyoktiḥ iti bahūnām alaṅkarāṇām saṃdehāt saṃdeha saṅkaraḥ

original: yathā vā--“mukhacandraṃ paśyāmi” ityatra kiṃ mukhaṃ candra iva ityupamā ?
analyzed: yathā vā amukha candram paśyāmi iti atra kim mukham candraḥ iva iti upamā
uta candraḥ eva iti rūpakam iti saṃdehaḥ
sādhaka bādhakayoḥ dvayoḥ ekatarasya sadbhāve na punar saṃdehaḥ
yathā
mukha candram cumbati iti atra cumbanam mukhasya anukūlam iti upamāyāḥ sādhakam
candrasya tu pratikūlam iti rūpakasya bādhakam

original: “mukhacandraḥ prakāśate” ityatra prakāśākhyo dharmo rūpakasya sādhako mukhe upacaritatvena saṃbhavatīti nopamābādhakaḥ /
analyzed: mukha candraḥ prakāśate iti atra prakāśa ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ rūpakasya sādhakaḥ mukhe upacarita tvena saṃbhavati iti na upamā bādhakaḥ
rāja nārāyaṇam lakṣmīḥ tvām āliṅgati nirbharam

original: atra yoṣita āliṅganaṃ nāyakasya sādṛśye nocitamiti lakṣmyāliṅganasya rājanyāsaṃbhavādupamābādhakam,
analyzed: atra yoṣitaḥ āliṅganam nāyakasya sādṛśye na ucitam iti lakṣmī āliṅganasya rājanya asaṃbhavāt upamā bādhakam
nārāyaṇe saṃbhavāt rūpakam
evam
vadana ambuja meṇa akṣyā bhāti cañcala locanam
atra vadane locanasya sambhavāt upamāyāḥ sādhaka tā
ambuje ca asaṃbhavāt rūpakasya bādhaka tā

original: evaṃ--“sundaraṃ vadanāmbujam” ityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge “upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti vacanādupamāsamāso na saṃbhavatītyupamāyā  #
analyzed: evam sundaram vadana ambujam ityādau sādhāraṇa dharma prayoge upamitam vyāghra ādibhiḥ sāmānya aprayoge iti vacanāt upamā samāsaḥ na saṃbhavati iti upamāyāḥ
bādhakaḥ
evam ca atra mayūra vyaṃsaka ādi tvāt rūpaka samāsaḥ eva
eka āśraya anupraveśaḥ yathā mama

original: “kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: kaṭākṣeṇa api īṣat kṣaṇam api nirīkṣeta yadi sā tad ānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihita aśeṣa viṣayaḥ
sa romāñca udañcat kuca kalaśa nibhinna vasayaḥ parīrambha ārambhaḥ kaḥ iva bhavitā ambhoruha dṛśaḥ
atra kaṭākṣeṇa api iṣat kṣaṇam api iti atra cheka anuprāsasya nirīkṣeta iti atra kṣakāram ādāya vṛtti anuprāsasya ca eka āśraye nupraveśaḥ
evam ca atra eva anuprasā artha āpatti alaṅkārayoḥ
yathā vā
saṃsāra dhvānta vidhvaṃsaḥ iti atra rūpaka anuprāsayoḥ

original: yathā vā--“kurabakāravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ” ityatra rabakā ravakā ityekaṃ bakāravakāra ityekamiti yamakayoḥ /
analyzed: yathā vākura bakārava kāraṇatām yayuḥ iti atra rabakāḥ ravakāḥ iti ekam bakāravakāraḥ iti ekam iti yamakayoḥ
yathā vā
ahi naa paoa rasiesu diahesu
rahasa pasāria gīāṇam mā uravindāṇam
atra iti ekāśraye pathika śaya āmāyitā iti upamā
pathika sāmājikeṣu iti rūpakam praviṣṭam iti
śrī candraśekhara mahā kavi candrasūnu śrī viśvanātha kavi rāja kṛtam prabandham

original: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta // VisSd_10.99 //
analyzed: sāhitya darpaṇam amum sudhiyaḥ vilokya sāhitya tattvam akhilam sukham eva vitta
yāvat prasanna indu nibha ānanā śrīḥ nārāyaṇasya aṅgam alaṅkaroti

original: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke // VisSd_10.100 //
analyzed: tāvat manaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnām eṣa prabandhaḥ prathitaḥ stu loke
iti ālaṅkārika cakravarti sāndhivigrahika mahāpātra śrī viśvanātha kavi rāja kṛte sāhityadarpaṇe daśamaḥ paricchedaḥ
